actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a waiver of the 3-year limitation on claiming a credit or refund.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to waive the three-year limitation on claiming a credit or refund upon a showing of good cause and reasonable diligence by the taxpayer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a waiver of the 3-year limitation on claiming a credit or refund.
